macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Decline on Monday, December 29, 2025
items.summary: The Dow fell 249.04 points (0.5%) to 48,461.93, S&P 500 dropped 24.20 points (0.3%) to 6,905.74, Nasdaq fell 118.75 points (0.5%) to 23,474.35, and Russell 2000 declined 14.55 points (0.6%) to 2,519.80. Despite the slip, major indexes remain strongly up for 2025: S&P 500 +17.4%, Dow +13.9%, Nasdaq +21.6%, Russell 2000 +13%.

items.title: FOMC Minutes Release Expected Tuesday for Insights on December Rate Cut
items.summary: FOMC minutes from the December meeting, where the Fed cut rates by 25 basis points, are due Tuesday, with focus on hawkish dissents from Goolsbee and Schmid. Markets face a short week, closing early Wednesday and closed Thursday for New Year's Day.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Dragonfly Managing Partner Lays Out 2026 Crypto Predictions
items.summary: Dragonfly’s Qureshi predicts insane growth in two key crypto areas for 2026. L1 tokens broadly underperformed in 2025 despite regulatory and institutional wins.

items.title: XRP and SOL Investment Products Defy Crypto Slump as Billions Pour In While Bitcoin Bleeds
items.summary: XRP and SOL investment products see billions in inflows amid market recovery attempts in late 2025. Bitcoin briefly climbed above $90,000 before pulling back sharply.

items.title: Bitcoin Whipsaws Under $90K as 2026 Model Slips, Ethereum Forecast Jumps 61%
items.summary: Bitcoin price volatility keeps it under $90K with its 2026 model slipping. Ethereum's forecast surges 61% amid ongoing market movements.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: OpenAI's GPT-5 Designs Science Experiments 79x Faster
items.summary: OpenAI's GPT-5 model autonomously designs science experiments, helping Red Queen Bio improve gene copying processes 79 times faster than traditional methods. This breakthrough highlights AI's role in accelerating scientific discoveries.

items.title: Google Releases Gemini 3 and Gemini 3 Flash for Advanced Tasks
items.summary: Google launched Gemini 3 and Gemini 3 Flash in late 2025, capable of code writing, weather prediction, and more; AlphaFold has now aided over 3 million researchers worldwide.

items.title: Anthropic Launches Open-Source Agent Skills to Challenge OpenAI
items.summary: Anthropic introduced open-source Agent Skills for enterprises, enabling customizable AI systems as a competitive alternative to OpenAI's tools.

items.title: Security Teams Grapple with AI Trust and Rising Threats
items.summary: Organizations face increasing AI-driven attacks and uneven readiness, with 88% noting more AI-powered bot attacks and debates on trusting AI for security.

items.title: Machine Learning in Quantum Error Correction Vulnerable to Attacks
items.summary: Researchers show ML classifiers for quantum computers are susceptible to physical fault injection attacks, inducing mispredictions especially in dense layers.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Reveals Viewfinder as Free Game for December 29-30
items.summary: The Epic Games Store has made Viewfinder, a first-person puzzle platformer by Sad Owl Studios, available for free as part of its 2025 holiday giveaway, claimable only until December 30. This is the 13th title in the daily free game promotion running through the end of the year.

items.title: Epic Games Store Confirms Viewfinder for December 29 Free Mystery Slot
items.summary: Viewfinder has been officially unveiled as the free game on Epic Games Store for December 29–30, marking the 13th entry in the storefront's ongoing 2025 holiday giveaway series.

items.title: Zenless Zone Zero 2.5 Update Maintenance Scheduled for December 30
items.summary: Zenless Zone Zero's version 2.5 maintenance begins December 30 at 6 AM UTC+8 (December 29 evening for US players), lasting 5 hours until 11 AM UTC+8, introducing new content including a free S-Rank agent Zhao.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Renewable Energy Named Science's 2025 Breakthrough of the Year
items.summary: Science magazine has designated the renewable energy surge as 2025's Breakthrough of the Year, with solar efficiency reaching 45% using new perovskite cells and global wind power capacity tripling.

items.title: iPhone 17 Features Revolutionary Holographic Display Without Glasses
items.summary: Apple's iPhone 17 introduces a groundbreaking holographic display technology that operates without requiring glasses, marking a significant advancement in smartphone display innovation.

items.title: Google Pixel 10 Integrates Quantum Computing Chip
items.summary: Google's Pixel 10 smartphone comes equipped with a quantum computing chip, representing a major step in bringing quantum computing capabilities to consumer devices.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Introduces Self-Healing Screen Technology
items.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 features innovative self-healing screen technology, addressing durability concerns in foldable smartphone displays.

items.title: Commercial Moon Base Construction Begins
items.summary: Construction has commenced on the first commercial moon base, marking a significant milestone in space commercialization efforts.

items.title: New Propulsion System Cuts Mars Travel Time in Half
items.summary: A breakthrough propulsion technology has been developed that significantly reduces travel time to Mars, advancing human space exploration capabilities.

items.title: Microsoft Edge Tests AI Audio Translation Feature
items.summary: Microsoft is testing a new AI feature in Edge browser that can translate spoken content from videos into other languages almost instantly, enabling real-time multilingual accessibility.

items.title: Tech Stocks Face December Sell-Off Amid Valuation Concerns
items.summary: The AI-driven tech sector experienced a significant December 2025 sell-off, with the Nasdaq composite falling 0.6% as investors reassess valuations of major technology companies.
